name: Chaperone
description:
In this game, inspired by real events in 2001, your aim is to solve a murder whose cause is unknown, become a companion for the body found in the house at the time, and reach the truth that disturbs the dead body.

Supernatural entities
Paranormal entities that are constantly unknown where and when they will appear.

Developer's comment about the game
Chaperone can leave an impact on your psychology. We recommend that people who are afraid of the dark, have heart disease, or are afraid of being alone should not play alone.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Chaperone was inspired by a real event that took place in Munich, Germany in 2001. If research is done, you can still find issues similar to this story today...
